GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.4.227
GSD.description:
net: hisilicon: Fix potential use-after-free in hix5hd2_rx()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.227 by commit 1b6360a093ab8969c91a30bb58b753282e2ced4c, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 57c5bc9ad7d799e9507ba6e993398d2c55f03fab. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: hisilicon: Fix potential use-after-free in hix5hd2_rx()
